summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in blocks 9 and 10, Crown Addition, being the alley between 8th Avenue West and 9th Avenue West, from West Garfield Street to West Blaine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 105917 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
